# Millkox

Started `2025-07-06`.

Hubs, Shockers and Offline Remotes can be purchased through my Shop.

Custom 3D prints can be ordered via discord.

*The HUBs are using the latest OpenShock V2.2 board, designed by Nullstalgia*

## Contact

- :simple-discord: Discord -- `millkox`
- :material-link: Shop: [milkieverse.cc](https://milkieverse.cc)
- :simple-discord: Discord Server:  [discord.milkieverse.cc](https://discord.com/invite/9824xbSgcJ) (via support system)
